code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import HeaderLinks from'./HeaderLinks';import Logo from'./assets/mgilogo.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const[hoverItem,setHoverItem]=useState(null);const[isExpanded,setIsExpanded]=useState(false);const headerVariants={initial:{height:"initial",backgroundColor:"transparent"},expanded:{height:"50vh",backgroundColor:"#ffffff",transition:{duration:0.5}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:"initial",animate:isExpanded?"expanded":"initial",variants:headerVariants,className:"header-container",onMouseLeave:()=>setIsExpanded(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-light fixed-top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center w-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeaderLinks,{setHoverItem:item=>{setHoverItem(item);setIsExpanded(!!item);}})})})})});}export default Header;
